com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap.api.view

Interface OutlineableView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BootstrapButton, BootstrapButtonGroup, BootstrapDropDown

    public interface OutlineableView
    Views which implement this interface allow the user to specify whether the view should be displayed as an outline or not.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String KEY 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isShowOutline() 
      void setShowOutline(boolean showOutline)
      Sets whether the view should display itself as an outline or not.

    • Field Detail

      • KEY

        static final java.lang.String KEY
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setShowOutline

        void setShowOutline(boolean showOutline)
        Sets whether the view should display itself as an outline or not.
        Parameters:
        showOutline - true to display as an outline, otherwise false

      • isShowOutline

        boolean isShowOutline()
        Returns:
        true if the view is currently displaying itself as an outline
